nodes.text: A group of Rodian hunters ventured onto the Rryatt Trail — a long and winding trail through the dense Kashyyykian forests during the Galactic Civil War. They set up a small camp on the Wroshyr Canopy level of the trail when they got lost and couldn't find their way back.
The camp consisted of several primitive tents made out of wood and hide. When a spacer found the camp in 1 ABY, the tents were collapsed and destroyed.
